name: Pocket Monsters Geum
description: Enter a whole new world, with new Pokémon to train, capture, and battle!Meet Professor Elm and get the all-new Poke Gear, including map, radio, cell phone, and clock.Set the clock and then watch as day turns to night and events take place in real time - and be sure to keep an eye out for Pokémon that only come out at night!
